A country's culture can change how we think and act. But many other things are also important. The part of a country we are from is important. The groups we are in are important. Our age and if we are a man or a woman is important. The way we act at work is also important. And the things that happen in our own life are important.

So, it is good to know that people can be different. But we should not think everyone from one country is the same. That is wrong.
Feedback received: Grade 1/10 - FAIL
